metadata.title: CVE-2024-45797 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: LibHTP is a security-aware parser for the HTTP protocol and the relatedbits and pieces. Prior to version 0.5.49, unbounded processing of HTTPrequest and response headers can lead to excessive CPU time and memoryutilization, possibly leading to extreme slowdowns. This issue is addressedin 0.5.49.

criterions.comment: libhtp package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
